H0.text: Where did comic book character 'Desperate Dan' live. Drygulch

H1.text: Where did comic book character 'Desperate Dan' live. Red Rock

H2.text: Where did comic book character 'Desperate Dan' live. Buckaroo

H3.text: Where did comic book character 'Desperate Dan' live. Cactusville

A4.text: There is a statue of Dan in Dundee, Scotland, where his publishers, D. C. Thomson & Co. are based.

A5.text: Desperate Dan is a wild west character in the now-defunct Scottish comic magazine The Dandy.

A6.text: Many of the characters in The Dandy lived in the fictional town of Dandytown.
